medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Diarrhea for 4 days and abdominal pain for 1 day, starting as bilateral lower abdominal pain that localized to the right lower quadrant. Symptoms worsened in severity throughout the day without relief from bowel movement. The patient experienced nausea and anorexia, with slight improvement after taking Pepto Bismol. Last bowel movement was 10 hours ago.
medical_history.family_history: Question of some sort of colon problem(s) in his mother's family, unsure if family history of IBD.
